mng: to deceive, to confuse, to cheat, absurd, erroneous

exm.mng: absolutely ridiculous (idiom); preposterous, the height of folly
the slightest difference leads to a huge error (idiom), a miss is as good as a mile
exm.pyn: chā zhī háo lí , miù yǐ qiān lǐ

exm.mng: error, fallacy, misconception, scoundrel, You swine!
erroneous views, false idea, false opinion
a tiny lapse can lead to a huge mistake (idiom); a minor discrepancy leading to enormous losses
exm.pyn: shī zhī háo lí , miù yǐ qiān lǐ
